Paresh Mayani.intro: Paresh Mayani is the founder and organizer of GDG Ahmedabad. He has about 8 years of experince in Android development. He currently works at Simform Solution as Android Technical Lead.

Dhrumil Shah.intro: Dhrumil Shah is a co-organizer at GDG Ahmedabad. He currently works at Shipmnts as Mobile application developer.

Pratik Patel.intro: Pratik Patel is a co-organizer at GDG Ahmedabad. He currently works at TheRedSpace.

Chintan Rathod.intro: Chintan Rathod is a co-organizer at GDG Ahmedabad. He is working as a Android Team Lead in a MNC company at Ahmedabad.

Jaldeep Asodariya.intro: Jaldeep Asodariya is a core organizer at GDG Ahmedabad. He is an Android Developer and working at JB Solutions.

Dhruva Shastri.intro: Dhruva Shastri leads the Women Tech Makers Ahmedabad group. She is an Android Developer and working at Echo Innovate IT

Utpal Betai.intro: Utpal Betai is an assistant organizer at GDG Ahmedbad. He is working as project manager at SoluLab Inc.
